entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Writing to `StreamWriter.Null` can cause exceptions #98457
    9.0.0
  • [BUG] Cancellation token doesn't seem to respect the cancellation times #98452
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator hangs #98447
  • [mono][ios] MonoAOT crashes when the app uses SQLite library with a `DateTime` member in DTO #98428
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IPNetwork.Contains for IPv4 networks should match IPv4-Mapped IPv6 Addresses #98427
  • `Type.GetType` throws when passed `Program&&` #98426
    9.0.0
  • `FileSystemWatcher` does not work when there is more than 1 instance of it #98424
  • JIT: CSE for passthrough nodes CQ issue #98413
    9.0.0
  • Runtime Crash (SIGSEGV) on iOS #98410
  • [browser][MT] Assert failed: Cannot find Promise for JSHandle -2 #98406
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: UInt64.DivRemByUInt32 #98405

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Assert in ILC when compiling System.Data.DataSetExtensions.Tests in Debug build #97758
  • Investigate removing nops from substitutions #81339
    Future
  • Reflection Invoke does not check ContainsGenericParameters #95245
  • runtimeconfig.json not found #96957
  • CodeDom - method invocation on a string with length in a range of 80 to 256 chars or above 1500 chars #91060
    9.0.0
  • Question: best way to get operator method in reflection #98402
  • [API Proposal]: Consider support for `\U` escape sequence in `Regex` #98341
  • Review UX and bindings for .NET Swift interop tooling in simple P/Invoke void cases #98431
    9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable aggressive trimming for functional tests with Mono #90025
    9.0.0
  • [infra] Update the pipeline to run apple mobile library tests with Native AOT #91872
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 2/5/2024 1:05:09 PM #98370
  • NativeAOT packages contain two copies of msbuild files #96556
  • Allows setting of 4 spaces indentation or 2 spaces indentation in JsonSerializerOptions.[API Proposal]: #98423
  • NativeAOT: support for building static libraries for Debug CRT on Windows #98356
  • [Android][Regression] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:657, condition `lock->done' not met #96804
    8.0.x
  • NuGet authenticate task used by jitrollingbuild is deprecated #96745
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HY_3A` to `SVE_IB_3A` #98468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cse new candidate strategy #98467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98465
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #98456
    area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98455
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #98454
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Forward the pgoinstrument argument to the inner build for VMR/Source-build builds #98446
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Streaming mode for SPMI #98440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLlink] In DIM finding, exit early if the interface doesn't impl the DIM we're looking for #98436
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • X509Chain.Build should throw when an internal error occurs #98435
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify formatting strings for various "reason" fields #98434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • [mono] Block SIMD types in Swift interop #98429
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • suggesting braces around initialization of subobject while building runtime repo #98420
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Discard simple dominated CSEs that will never be defs #98417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix deadlock when we request a ReJIT due to an inlined method #98400
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix some comments on interfaces in `System.Numerics` #98398
    area-System.Numerics
  • XUnitLogChecker: Ensure missing stack frames are resolved on Windows using dotnet-sos #98397
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Revert "[release/6.0][workloads] Use Wix version from arcade Sdk" #98466
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98390
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [ILLink] Don't box ScopeStack structs as IDisposable #98396
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98389
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't place MSBuild files to target-specific ILCompiler packages #98411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Turn unreachable basic blocks into an infinite loop #98319
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reject attempts to invoke uninstantiated methods #98408
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Build linux-arm and linux-musl-arm NAOT runtime packs #98414
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix stepping into assembly thunks #98401
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix more bugs found with ILVerify #98393
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Handle large imm values in ARMEmitter.EmitLDR #98433
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging][workloads] Use Wix version from arcade Sdk #98449
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0][workloads] Use Wix version from arcade Sdk #98450
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0][workloads] Use the Wix version from arcade #98453
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • [workloads] Pull the Wix version from the arcade.sdk #98437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add build analysis config file to runtime #97465
    needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #97070
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98339
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Unify preheader/exit weight calculation logic #98407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix remaining issues before enabling new EH by default #98322
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use FlowEdge destination block in a few loop related cases #98403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restore RSA 16384 tests to innerloop #98102
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Throw correct overflow exception in IDiv/IMod helper #98416
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add linux-musl-arm to ILCompilerRIDs #98412
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_GQ_3A #98352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove synchronization from Http2Connection.ExtendWindow #97878
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Disable failing OCSP tests tests #98362
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Add a simple `Counter` dumpable #98350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shrink `.eh_frame` section in naot executables #98355
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [debugger][mt][browser] Disable `TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` that times out #98111
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Add some more null guards in the OSSL crypto PAL #98386
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't strip pointed-to type information in IL stubs #98392
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    area-System.Net.Http
  • This is an incomplete implementation of a new randomized allocation s… #98167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement ReadOnlySpan.CastUp #98395
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Importer forward substitution #98380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64 SVE: Add FZ_2A, HG_2A, GZ_3A, GV_3A, GY_3*, DV_4A #98310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Fold "cast(cast(obj, cls), cls)" to "cast(obj, cls)" #98337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Move reflection from JS to C# #98391
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [mono][jit] Use the same code to emit Vector/Vector<T> intrinsics on … #98317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][MT] Log ManagedThreadId and NativeThreadId for known test failures #98291
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve workloads experience when customers are changing around feeds #38784
  • dotnet workload restore doesn't restore required SDKs since 8.0.200 #38769
  • MVC View not found when deploying to Azure with Azure DevOps pipeline since SDK 8.0.200 #38766

Closed

  • .NET 9 SDK prints relative path for build artifacts (UX) #38552

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding #38792
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2378822 #38776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework for analysis #38754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38692
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38752
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38740
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38712
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38737
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #38045
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0.3xx] [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `SpecialType` entry for `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #72102
  • Redundant error reported on attribute argument when using a constant field involving a circular reference #72101
    Backlog
  • False positive for CS1503 with MSBuild 17.10, but not dotnet build #72098
  • CallerMemberName doesn't recognize local functions #72095

Closed

  • ParameterSymbol.ToDisplayString/Parts(SymbolDisplayFormat.FullyQualifiedFormat) only outputs the paramter name. #72108
  • Nullable state not properly set on variables in pattern on erroneous call #67880
    Backlog
  • [LSP] [Bug]: New line in or immediately below documentation comment does not break line correctly #69441
    18.0
  • "The server disconnected unexpectedly" when using package referencing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild #71914
  • 'ctor' snippet generate wrong name in nested class #68176
    17.8 P4
  • When I convert an "if" statement containing a checked expression into a conditional expression in the c# editor, it is converted to unintended code. #70748
    Backlog
  • XML Documation for Primary Constructors does not round trip with automated refactoring #72096

PullRequests

Created

  • Reuse compilation tracker states when possible. #72111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Flags with caching #72110
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Simplify how frozen partial documents are produced. #72106
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add dedicated bit for indicating if a node itself has annotations (versus its children). #72104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove .NET 7 install step #72100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support for features in Copilot Chat #72097
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add more tests and address some of the PROTOTYPE comments #72089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Publish assets from the demo/razor-lexer branch #72112
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add helper method for forking compilation states #72105
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change NullableWalker.VisitConversion to not unsplit #72062
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add an assertion that the .NET Core BuildHost is deployed #72091
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Wait for navigation to complete #71994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • UseConditionExpression: Add support for checked expression in if and return statement #72099
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Bump a few transitively included packages to 8.0 #72092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Unify handling of constant and not constant chars during string concat #72086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Defer parsing syntax trees when computing frozen partial solutions #72090
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Grab 4 more bits for use as node flags. Use additional bit to store if nodes contain attributes within them. #72070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial proposal for artifacts #71781
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Revert dotnet installation #71988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] WebAssembly JS initializers don't execute unless `webAssembly` options are provided to `Blazor.start()` #54049
  • Allow use of 'Addition assignment operator' in TagHelper HtmlAttribute #54045
  • Extend Meta data able to be fetched about a Session #54044
  • Microsoft Identity 8.0.2 #54038
  • Improve server addresses collection debugging #54030
  • Perf regression: caching #54028
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54027
  • RazorRuntimeCompilation bug when assembly emitted by Roslyn with empty location added as MVC application part #54024
  • Latest .NET SDK 8.0.20 update causes build failures in Azure devOps hosted pools with latest Visual Studio #54023
  • Only submit 1 AntiforgeryToken in Blazor SSR mode #54022

Closed

  • [EPIC] `dotnet user-jwts` in .NET 8 #46263
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Adjusting the default Kestrel development certificate to support WebTransport #42787
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Identity endpoint /manage/info not responding after deployment to Azure #52805
  • Blazor Web project with Auth does not correctly configure Logout service #52948
  • AspNetCore.Identity against ADFS #52661
  • Seperate SignInManager and UserManager concerns #52650
  • QuickGrid with Virtualize=true - Samples Question #54034
  • ErrorBoundary not working with Blazor App with Interactive Auto #53840
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #54029
  • TicketSerializer deserialized authentication ticket does not match the serialized one. #53998
  • Expose JavaScript interoperability Initialization Status in Blazor #53995
  • Optional work on assignment for custom events added through `blazor.registerCustomEventType` #53759
  • .NET Blazor - two way data binding with handler method in parent component issue #53914
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #53942
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54013

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Improve Blazor project template #54048
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Update CODEOWNERS #54043
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Delete markdownlint workflow #54042
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 8.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Avoid downloading browsers during source build #54036
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Only run markdownlint on main #54041
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Update Identity dependencies #53883
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview2
  • Enable portable cross-arch source-building to unknown architectures. #54031
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Infrastructure] Add `CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink` to the retry list #54033
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [Infrastructure] Update npm dependencies #53986
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `dotnet-trace` speedscope report: the call of one method is divided into different pieces #4490
    9.0.0
  • dotnet-dsrouter not connecting on iOS - "Failed connecting 9191 over usbmux, wait 500 ms before retrying." #4058
    8.0.0

Updated

  • dotnet-trace should not default to all keywords and verbose #4511
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #4513
  • Change provider defaults for dotnet-trace #4512
    dotnet-trace, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • KNOWN ISSUE: .NET SDK 8.0.200 Installs the Incorrect MAUI Workload Versions #20600
  • [Testing] Enable the multi-project template build test #20598
  • [Testing] Review failures from WinUI testing that aren't reporting errors or generating exceptions #20597
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Button with corner radius shadow broken on Android device #20596
    Backlog
  • Unloaded and Loaded events get called multiple times #20595
    Backlog
  • it working ,but now when this is errur Gravité Code Description Projet Fichier Ligne État de la suppression Erreur NU1012 La version de la plateforme n'est pas présente pour un ou plusieurs frameworks cibles, même s'ils ont spécifié une plateforme : net8.0-ios, net8.0-maccatalyst MauiApp1 C:\Users\cc\Desktop\MauiApp1\MauiApp1\MauiApp1.csproj 1 #20593
  • Conflicting values for resource 'Files/Microsoft.Maui/Platform/Windows/Styles/WindowRootViewStyle.xbf' #20592
  • The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui 8.0.7 #20591
  • [iOS] Layout breaks easily in Landscape mode when ScrollView is wrapped in another layout #20590
  • [Shell] Investigate Making TabbedPage compatible with Shell for Android/Windows #20588
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ScrollView's size is not being recalculated, when the size of content changes #20586
  • iOS Linker removes support for PCLCrypto.SymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider.GetAlgorithm #20583
  • [testing] Reenable test for #18751 #20582
    Backlog
  • Option for disabeling "more" option in Flyout menu #20579

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DbUpdateException Entries Inconsistent When First Fails (i = 0) vs Subsequent Fails (i > 0) #33098
  • Query: review (JSON) materializer code for queries with NoTrackingWithIdentityResolution #33097
  • Trouble Mocking EntityEntry #33095
  • Reduce allocations by setting capacity on dictionaries #33093
  • dotnet ef tools 8.0.2 not compatible with .Net SDK 8.0.101? #33092
  • Where is DynamicModelCacheKeyFactoryDesignTimeSupport registered in the sample project? #33091

Closed

  • EF.Property throws exception when used with dynamic property name from a different entity #33078
  • IPluralizer interface seems to be missing from Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design Package V 8.0.2 #33094
  • AsSplitQuery generates incorrect sql if Convert(date, ...) is used #32958
  • The data type geography cannot be used as an operand to the UNION, INTERSECT or EXCEPT operators because it is not comparable #33065
  • I need a setting or option to store all the enums as string in database including the enum columns or enums inside the json columns (even if they are at root of the json or multi level in depth due to complexity of json) #33035
  • I found an issue related to parentheses within a query in entity framework core. #33026
  • I found an issue related to parentheses within a query in entity framework #33024
  • Add configuration files for dotnet ef #33005
  • Expose StateManager.TryGetEntry in DbContext.ChangeTracker #33003
  • How to make `Include` method work in custom `IQueryable` collection ? #32964
  • Visual Studio 2022 It is not installed Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer #32959
  • Update object value by with key #32955
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: 'Argument data type NULL is invalid for argument 2 of JSON_VALUE function.' #32952
  • Database.Migrate fails after first run #32669
  • Delete_entity_with_auto_include fails on Sqlite/PG #30577
  • Include on multiple Many-to-Many relationships of the same CLR-Type returns empty set when bi-directional relationship is configured #33081
  • Using generic key in TPH causes multiple columns on child tables #33086
  • `dotnet ef migrations` Invalidates SLN Cache, Resulting a Full Recompile #25878
    9.0.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33090
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33089
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #33085
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #33083
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #33084
